Starstorm:

the lady still was sobbing and she huged thightly the snake

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, foxmanroar1@a... wrote:
> He coiled around her lovingly. "Never, we are meant to be 
togehter, it will 
> alwaysss be thisss way." He Tickled her with his snake tongue. "Be 
happy my 
> dear we are together again." He transformed and easily swept her 
into his arms.
